body:
Good day all. I am Jacketguy.

Hello, I am new to Avicus forums, so excuse me if I do something stupid. I played Avicus before I got a Minecraft account, and the when I got one I moved on to Overcast Network. I recognise some of you are from there too. Things were nice there and today I thought why not give Avicus a visit. And so I did, and it turned out Avicus is actually an interesting network. So yeah, hope to see ya around :P
